ygData.subject: Re: Hi..in addition
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree with the response mostly but would also like to add that when choosing a god I would really try to choose a char that can be agnostic...it will cause
ygData.messageBody:
I agree with the response mostly but would also
like to add that when choosing a god I would really
try to choose a char that can be agnostic...it will
cause you less problems. Some towns that you would
normally be ok to enter will kill you on site just for the
god that you worship. (it's called KOS killed on
site) Also though it may be a little hard to do and
some may dissagree with me I would suggest trying to
get into a guild. Some only except higher lvl char
but there are a few that will take you as a newbie
and teach you the ropes. I know that I would have had
a much harder time gaining lvls and obtaining cool
equip. if it wasn't for the guild that I belong to. My
guild is very newbie friendly and will help anyone with
most anything...such as tp (teleports), money, equip,
buffs, ect. It is always good to have friends in high
places..:) anyway that is my two coppers worth. Go well and
good hunting friend!<br>simply ~Wyld~
